pages.title: Lodestone Dynamo
pages.text: The <item>Lodestone Dynamo/$ is the inverse of the normal <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/dynamo)Dynamo/$. Instead of consuming <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/rotary)rotary power/$ (J) and producing Forge Energy (FE), it consumes FE and produces J, at the same exchange rate as the <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/dynamo)Dynamo/$.$(br2)
